website_summaries.verdict: This product removes gel polish easily without being too harsh on your nails, skin, or cuticles.
pros: Soaks off gel polish in as little as 15 minutes with minimal scrubbing
A little bit of remover goes a long way
Includes conditioning agents to prevent your nails and cuticles from drying out
cons: Doesn't remove gel polish as quickly as pure acetone removers

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price. Better just buy acetone and alcohol at Target to do the same job.
customer_reviews.text: This is not worth the money at all. Pricy for little product. bottle is already open, not sealed. Smell like a regular acetone that you can get at target or Walmart. I feel like I’ve just been ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hang

customer_reviews.title: Great for at gel nails!
customer_reviews.text: I have my own gel manicure kit at home and this works great for my weekly gel manicure without it damaging my natural nail. Works better and quicker when you slightly file the top layer off. Put on a youtube video and leave your nails soaking in a bowl or soak 2-3 cotton balls and peel off 10 small ones with 10 small square aluminum foil sheets and wrap them around each fingernail individually and wait!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Otero

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Probably made in someone’s kitchen by dollar store products. Had tape with product label, not made by Gelish.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Poorly packaged.  One bottle completely leaked out.
customer_reviews.text: The pink liquid leaked everywhere. Since it’s made of alcohol, the only trace is the pink coloring. It was poorly packaged. I was so excited for this product to come in and now I can’t even use it. I’m left with just an empty bottle. And of course it’s not Eligible for return.
customer_reviews.author: MGN83

customer_reviews.title: :o/
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what to expect from this soak off polish remover as I am switching from acrylics to gels but this product takes forever to even put a dent in the gel. I waited over 45 minutes, kept soaking the cotton and it barely took it off. Finally filed most of it down and removed the rest with it. Yes, I was using the remover. Don't ever file your nail just the product.
customer_reviews.author: Catie

customer_reviews.title: A great complement
customer_reviews.text: The nail surface cleanse is good to use after top it off, this product let the nails dry. And the artificial nail remover is good after file your nail (remove the top it off)
customer_reviews.author: Aura Jaimes

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: The pink I was expecting to remove gel polish without having to soak. Its basically just a normal nail polish remover. The blue is great, it takes of the sticky residue on the top layer when you use a gel machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again when in need of them
customer_reviews.text: Rarely do my nails like I used to but this is the perfect size for people who do their nails at home. When I do use these I am surprised I still have some left since I bought these early in the year.
customer_reviews.author: jensintoacid

customer_reviews.title: Good for at Home Nails
customer_reviews.text: Love this starter set for doing my gel nails at home. I’ve had the same bottles for about a year now and am about 3/4 of the way done with the blue bottle but have almost a full bottle of the pink. Lasts a while and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: janessa022

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: Thank God I used it on myself before I had a client in my chair. 1st red flag, the solution seemed light in color AND washed out. Had good faith tho, like "yeah right, they didn't!" Oh but they DID. When soaked my cotton pad, I smelled the faint smell of CHEAP nail polish remover. This is NOT ACETONE nor is it real GELISH product, so it doesn't work on or for gel polish. Gelish IS gel polish. Im so confused here..don’t waste your money or time. Seller ignores emails and amazon apparently does as well. I spend too much money here to be dupped like this..
customer_reviews.author: P. Koslofski

customer_reviews.title: Bottle Leaked in the Shipping Box
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Gelish Artificial Nail Remover and the Nail Surface Cleanse. When I opened my package, the bottle of Nail Surface Cleanse was half way gone and there were blue markings in the cardboard box that showed where it had leaked out. I am frustrated because I didn't pay for a half full bottle and because it is flammable, I can't return it.
customer_reviews.author: LN

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is great to remove gel polish and lasts a very long time. I will continue to purchase it as long as it is available. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: mialight

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to remove gel polish and prep the names for gel polish. It did exactly as I needed it to... recommended my friend to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shay C

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: This thing did not work at all and one of the bottles was almost all spilled during shipping and is not returnable. Thank goodness for Amazon Prime, they refunded me.
customer_reviews.author: ida

customer_reviews.title: Don’t love these
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special and doesn’t really work well. Tried to take some gel off my skin when first starting to do my nails and it didn’t come out :-(
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gel remover!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff removes gel polish really well. You only need to soak for 10 minutes to get it off.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: That regular acetone will work just as well and way cheaper.
customer_reviews.text: The cleanser wasn't even full!! Looked like it had been used. And after I ordered it I was told it wasn't necessary to buy it because all I needed was regular acetone to wipe the sticky residue off!! Won't buy this again now that I know i can go to the Dollar tree and get a big bottle of acetone for a $1.00..
customer_reviews.author: Jan B.

customer_reviews.title: Buy straight acetone
customer_reviews.text: Just buy straight acetone. It will be cheaper and work just as good. It took me about an hour to get my gelish polish off.
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette Slack

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use for a great price
customer_reviews.text: The remover works really well when allows to soak on the nail for about 10 minutes. My gelish top coat can be really sticky and the residue remover works excellent as long as I soak a cotton ball well. I have used both about 5 times and have not been disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Could have been better at removal
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in the remover....doesn’t even seem as strong as regular nail polish remover! Still needed to peel my polish off
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Shea

customer_reviews.title: Really great remover
customer_reviews.text: These are small bottles but if your just doing your own nails it’ll last you. There definitely is a scent but I wouldn’t say it’s super strong, sane as all other acetone polish removers. It does work really well though at removing the gel polish I’ve repurposed this so many times because it works.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy S Chacon

customer_reviews.title: Beware!
customer_reviews.text: I have always had very strong healthy nails. I used this product one time and my nail began to separate from the nails beds and my cuticles were burned and itchy. And I am not even able to return. Do not buy this
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Wish they were a little bigger but otherwise great product.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie ula

customer_reviews.title: well...
customer_reviews.text: It works well, but it takes a lot of product. I hot this to save money, not spend more.
customer_reviews.author: C. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t tried the remover yet only the cleaner. So far I am satisfied. I love this brand. Speedy shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal M.

customer_reviews.title: Nail polish remover and cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little while to soak off the gel polish but very quick with regular polish! Pleasant light odor and doesn't dry my skin out!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Leaky package
customer_reviews.text: Like a few others have mentioned, there is no seal. The bottles are just put in a bag and shipped with some stuffing. The nail surface cleanser I received (blue liquid) leaked during shipment and now Im down half a bottle.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: ReOrdered because they work
customer_reviews.text: I re-ordered these because they get the job done and I could them on Prime quickly unlike similar products.
customer_reviews.author: CorinaT

customer_reviews.title: great deal
customer_reviews.text: I love this duo, My cleanser is completely gone , need to purchase more
customer_reviews.author: livvy-lou

customer_reviews.title: Not totally sure this is the same formula sold in ...
customer_reviews.text: Not totally sure this is the same formula sold in Sally's Beauty or if my polishes and/or kit is getting old. My gel polish doesn't seem to stay on as long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gel nail polish remover
customer_reviews.text: It does really work soaking for about 8min and my nails are ready to peel off
customer_reviews.author: Virginia H. Ottlinger

customer_reviews.title: Gelish is as good as it gets
customer_reviews.text: Both of these products PERFORM and the smell is light. I’m beyond happy with these two bottles and no spills in shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Just use regular acetone
customer_reviews.text: The pink remover works exactly the same as regular acetone, and costs far more. However, the blue cleaner is worth it in my opinion, but I’d recommend just buying by itself.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Bogenberger

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Love it 😍 my recommendations 👍👍👍 Best removal ever for me 👍
customer_reviews.author: Nalya

customer_reviews.title: love being able to do this at home.
customer_reviews.text: great product. was able to purchase more Gel polish. great savings!!
customer_reviews.author: Lovora P. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Described Not Fake
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping and the item is exactly as described, not fake! Very pleased and will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Yates

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Being what it is there was some loss of product in shipping, otherwise ok
customer_reviews.author: Trish W

customer_reviews.title: Handy cause of its size
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t smell bad like others and it does the job pretty well!
customer_reviews.author: Zerina

customer_reviews.title: Save your Money
customer_reviews.text: Save your money. Not effective for removing acrylic or gel polish.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: It wasn't full (almost half !!)
customer_reviews.text: The blue bottle wasn't full when I received them. I noticed the lid wasn't tight and it had lost some of the liquids during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A.

customer_reviews.title: Works like it’s supposed to!
customer_reviews.text: Works like it’s supposed to! No bad smells and gets the sticky mess off of the gel polish.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING!!! I used this for removing gel polish it came off quickly!
customer_reviews.author: tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for gel removal and nail cleaning
customer_reviews.author: Yanelyessie

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have liked this product and it works just like it needs to. I didn't have any issues with it being fake product or broken/leaking on arrival. The only thing I haven't liked is having to buy them together. I've used way more of the pink polish remover than I have the blue so I need to buy the pink again but I don't need more of the blue. Ill have to see if I can buy them separately through another source. Works on Gelish brands as well as others.
customer_reviews.author: Carly McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Like 👍
customer_reviews.text: Both work as the indications say, the fragrance is pleasant, I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Works better than acetone
customer_reviews.text: Will definitely be buying this again. It smells nice and it doesn’t not dry my skin like acetone does. It works faster than acetone. I know cuz I tried them both, one hand acetone and the other hand this product and woolllaaa this product was able to get the gel off faster. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Y@ry

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOND OF THIS REMOVER SET
customer_reviews.text: This remover makes my nails intensely dry. I stopped using it after two applications. It also looked as if the tops of my nails had vertical lines in them. I've never seen these on my nails before.
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy from this seller.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think this is authentic Gelish product. It spilled out during shipment. The labels are not on there correctly.
customer_reviews.author: D. D. B

customer_reviews.title: Great to use with the gelish products!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying these at a local beauty supply store so I knew they are rather expensive. I like the gelish products and being able to order them to arrive quickly is a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: Midcoast Shopper

customer_reviews.title: UNBELIEVABLE small bottles
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I didn't notice that they're only 4 oz (yes, half a cup) of fluid in each bottle. DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY like I did!
customer_reviews.author: Kymberli Johnson

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these...
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite go to products for cleaning and removing my gel nails. Will buy again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa S.

customer_reviews.title: Love this Product
customer_reviews.text: The cleanser is amazing... haven't used the soak off but glad I have it if/when I remove my gel nails.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to remove gel polish.
customer_reviews.text: Used only once but very difficult to remove gel polish.
customer_reviews.author: lefty

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Seem to do what they are so supposed to do. I need to practice on doing gel nails.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my wife. She is very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: NevBill

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend this, its very gentle on the nail but also works very well!! Can't do without it.
customer_reviews.author: Bwick

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Work well for the gelish manicure, but they are more pricey
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

product_meta.title: NEW Gelish Soak Off Gel Nail Polish Remover & Cleanser Bottles 120mL (4 fl oz)
product_meta.description: Package Contains: - 1 x Gelish Polish Remover (4 fl oz) - 1 x Gelish Gel Polish Cleaner (4 fl oz) -------------------------------------- This bottle of Gelish Gel Polish Remover is designed to remove Gelish Soak-Off Gel Polish in 10 minutes or less, with conditioning additives that keep the skin from drying, and maintain a healthy nail. This Gelish Cleanser is especially formulated to work with Gelish Top It Off. Assures a high shine flesh without any tacky residue or without drying to the skin. Gelish Soak-Off Gel Polish applies like polish and cures in a LED lamp in 30 seconds, or 2 minutes in traditional UV lamps. Gelish stays on nails for up to 3 weeks with no chipping or peeling, and soaks completely off in only 10 - 15 minutes. This is part of the Gelish Urban Cowgirl Collection. 1 Buy = 1 Bottle! **We are an authorized Gelish Dealer!**
feature_bullets: New Gelish Gel Nail Polish Remover
Use with Gelish, Red Carpet Manicure, OPI and all other gel polishes
